"Hadi talks about his memories of Bruder. A long time ago, he fought alongside Bruder's forces when they made an expedition to Retem, and he personally helped Bruder out of a predicament. They've been separated of late thanks to the escalating series of battles, but thanks to <%me>, they've been able to reconnect. Hadi is grateful."
